titleStmt.title: A modest and just apology for; or, defence of the present East-India-Company Against the accusations of their adversaries. Wherein the crimes alledged against them, are fairly examined; the calumny's confuted, and all submitted to the judgment of impartial and unprejudiced persons.
titleStmt.author: Tenche, Nathaniel.

titleStmt.title: A modest and just apology for; or, defence of the present East-India-Company Against the accusations of their adversaries. Wherein the crimes alledged against them, are fairly examined; the calumny's confuted, and all submitted to the judgment of impartial and unprejudiced persons.
titleStmt.author: Tenche, Nathaniel.

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: N.T., i.e. Nathaniel Tenche.
